alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 3:13PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Latah and south central Benewah Counties through 245 PM PDT... At 213 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles northeast of Potlatch, or 19 miles south of St. Maries. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Emida and Sanders. This includes U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 368 and 375. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
